description:
It's easy to use, to navigate in the menu and the appearance is pretty friendly in terminal .
In the future, I wish to be in more languages because is not easy to translate every phrase and word .
summary: The program is useful to read the Bible in terminal

description: It's the most awkward program I've EVER used! I appreciate the time and effort the author may have put into it, and I’m sure it’s well intentioned. The user interface is extremely confusing and difficult use. I cannot find a way to simply sit down and start reading. It seems this program is intended to be more of a reference than it is for reading and studying. I want to just enter a book, pick my chapter, and just read to the end... this program does not easily allow you to pick up from anywhere. Searches are not flexible enough to work well. Just… weird. Sorry.
Doesn't work on Kubuntu 22.04.4 LTS (works fine on Ubuntu Christian Edition). Doesn't have a single Russian translation.
